name: Crocogame
description:
Crocos assemble! The world is full of monsters and it's up to you to stop them! Teleport to different maps and take on dangerous enemies in intense, action-packed battles. Upgrade your stats, use powerful essences and unleash ultimate spells to gain an advantage over your foes. Watch out for the evil boss looking to end your reign at its peak!

Can you climb to the top and complete all the maps at the highest difficulty level?



Features

  • Fast runs (~15 minutes each).
  • 10 build-defining stats you can upgrade every time you level up.
  • 6 unique crocos with diverse base stats and ultimate spells.
  • 70+ powerful essences. You can combine up to 4 of them to create unique builds.
  • 3 playable maps with different challenges.
  • 10 difficulty modifiers for each map to put your skills to the test.
  • Achievement-based progression. Unlock new crocos, essences, maps and difficulty points by completing achievements on different difficulty levels.
  • Challenging normal and elite enemies with diverse movesets.
  • Twin-stick controls for complete immersion in the action.
